Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.logging

Class SocketWriter

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Handler
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.logging.SocketWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Writer, Serializable
public final class SocketWriter
extends Handler
implements Writer
The SocketWriter defines a writer performing its output on a TCP socket. Its implementation is based on the Java Logging API.
See Also:
Handler, Serialized Form
